title: Golden Oreo Fudge Creme Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Are Golden Oreo Fudge Creme cookies the GOLD standard? Eh? Eh? Oreo Oration. Right here.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/gameovergreggy?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] [Applause] [Music] what's up everybody welcome to another Oreo oration I'm Greg Miller and while you out living your life and swimming in swimming pools and ponds and whatnot the fine people at Oreo were making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like this video and then subscribe to my Channel today we're reviewing golden Oreo fudge cream now it's still fudge cream week here we needed to we putting out some bad review scores we' brought in some more fudge creams here golden fudge creams let's see what we were doing last time around we got we got our list here the golden ory itself scored an 8.5 now the last fudge cream we did did an 8.5 uh mint Oreo fudge creams before then we had peanut butter and coconut both those getting nine uh it seems that fudge creams are the way to go but I never can taste the thing the actual cookies so let's see if this

creams before then we had peanut butter and coconut both those getting nine uh it seems that fudge creams are the way to go but I never can taste the thing the actual cookies so let's see if this matters at all uh every Oreo be Oreo oration begins with the first look they're open the Visos patented seal packaging there you go that's another good another good presentation I'd say right don't you think they're they're all uniform none are on top of each other they're intact the smell that's weird now we've talked many a time on this show about the fudge condom the fudge Independence Day 4 alien force field and I can somehow smell the shortbread cookie inside there let's get a look at it you you can see it's totally intact no reason I should be smelling shortbread I should smells fudge but there it is let's go to part two of the review process The Taste okay I'm tasting it and the sweetness is just climbing it's going you know I can feel the sugar enveloping my tongue it just broke weird

it is let's go to part two of the review process The Taste okay I'm tasting it and the sweetness is just climbing it's going you know I can feel the sugar enveloping my tongue it just broke weird when I put it down which is funny I don't know why I would do that if let's break it in half so you can see what you're getting into you know when you're talking about a peanut butter one you know what you're getting into here you have the regular old cream the shortbread cookie then the barrier of fudge around it or fudge chocolate around it um tast it again here yeah it's really sweet a really sweetness overload let's see how it pairs with milk again it's a fudge cream we all know how that's going to go right ladies and gentlemen you've watched this show before one two three yep nothing nothing is getting through that shell that is a shell of pure chaos that won't be stopped um so yeah don't dunk them in milk we talked about it before nothing to twist can't do the twist test on them but as

is getting through that shell that is a shell of pure chaos that won't be stopped um so yeah don't dunk them in milk we talked about it before nothing to twist can't do the twist test on them but as far as the cookie itself the final review it's it's sweet it's really sweet 6.0 okay you know what I mean like I don't I know who this appeals to I've talked to you I've talked to you out there before you know you golden cookie fans like this isn't anything special for you and there's no real reason to go out of your way to get it but if you're looking for a super sweet cookie it's here for you super sweet 6.0 a little bit sad the first fudge cream ever to really fall short of where we thought it was going to go but that's the way the cookie crumbles for the golden Oreo fudge cream but what do you think I'm sure you've tried it at home you've seen it in your stores leave your review as a video response below then like the video subscribe to my channel now here's the big thing are there

do you think I'm sure you've tried it at home you've seen it in your stores leave your review as a video response below then like the video subscribe to my channel now here's the big thing are there other Oreos out there I haven't reviewed on the show in the comments below make sure you tell me what they are where I can get them so the show can continue then share the video with your friends I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on dunking [Applause] [Music]
